randomrun.screen.first_launch.title: First Launch
randomrun.screen.first_launch.message:
Enable online features?

When enabled, the following data will be saved to the database:
- Your nickname
- Your records
- Number of speedruns

If you decline, no data will be sent, and online features will be unavailable.
randomrun.screen.first_launch.note: (You can change this later in settings)

randomrun.loading.fact.1: There are over 1400 unique items and blocks in Minecraft!
randomrun.loading.fact.2: Creepers are afraid of ocelots and cats.
randomrun.loading.fact.3: Naming a sheep 'jeb_' makes its wool change colors.
randomrun.loading.fact.4: RandomRun saves the history of all your runs and records.
randomrun.loading.fact.5: In Battle mode, you can compete with friends in real-time!
randomrun.loading.fact.6: Once, the mod's database exceeded its limit by 6000 times!
randomrun.loading.fact.7: The dev team has 1 programmer, the other 3 work on ideas.
randomrun.loading.fact.8: Minecraft 1.21.4 has over 1600 items, and any of them can be your target.
randomrun.loading.fact.9: Pigs become transport if you put a saddle on them. But you need a carrot on a stick to steer.
randomrun.loading.fact.10: Endermen take damage from water. Rain is their worst nightmare.
randomrun.loading.fact.11: The first version of RandomRun was written in just one weekend.
randomrun.loading.fact.12: The chance of seeing a pink sheep is only 0.164%. Take a screenshot if you see one!
randomrun.loading.fact.13: Zombie villagers can be cured with a Golden Apple and a Weakness Potion. Discounts guaranteed!
randomrun.loading.fact.14: The mod developer believes the best strategy is panic. (Just kidding).
randomrun.loading.fact.15: Boats in Minecraft don't break when falling from heights. The perfect parachute!
randomrun.loading.tip.1: Use a compass to find biomes or structures!
randomrun.loading.tip.2: Traveling 1 block in the Nether is equal to 8 blocks in the Overworld.
randomrun.loading.tip.3: Don't dig straight down! (Unless you are brave enough).
randomrun.loading.tip.4: Use the RandomRun compass to find the required biomes.
randomrun.loading.tip.5: Stuck? You can reset the run in the pause menu or with a hotkey.
randomrun.loading.tip.6: Trading with villagers is often easier than finding rare items.
randomrun.loading.tip.7: To find items faster, loot structures like villages and shipwrecks.
randomrun.loading.tip.8: Always carry a water bucket. It can save you from falls and lava.
randomrun.loading.tip.9: Gold tools are faster than diamond, but their durability is terrible.
randomrun.loading.tip.10: Place torches on the right wall when exploring caves. To exit, keep them on your left.
randomrun.loading.tip.11: Beds explode in the Nether. It's a dangerous but effective way to mine Netherite.
randomrun.loading.tip.12: A shield blocks 100% of creeper explosion damage. Craft it first!
randomrun.loading.tip.13: Sprint-jumping is the fastest way to travel, but it depletes hunger quickly.
randomrun.loading.tip.14: Don't look Endermen in the eyes unless you're ready to fight. Or wear a pumpkin.
randomrun.loading.tip.15: Press F3 + H to see item durability and IDs. Useful for speedruns!
randomrun.toast.speedrun_warning.title: Warning!
randomrun.toast.speedrun_warning.descrip: Speedruns are saved only to profile
